sentence.Network_en: The police identified the murderess from a smudge of blood on the shirt.
sentence.Network_cn: 警方从衬衫上的血迹辨认出女凶手.

sentence.Network_en: The murderess felt that her hands were stained with blood long after the marks had been removed.
sentence.Network_cn: 那个女杀手把手上的血迹洗掉很久后,仍觉得手上血迹斑斑.

sentence.Network_en: The lawyer wanted to know how the murderess had helped her accomplice get away.
sentence.Network_cn: 律师想知道女杀人犯是如何帮助她的同伙逃走的.

list.abs: She is a murderess and they describe her as a prostitute ., 她是一个刽子手 . 把她描绘成一个妓女.

entry.def: A murderess is a woman who has murdered someone.

auth_sentence.content: What drove him to do that, and so in this case, she was a murderess who appears twice in my book.
